analysis.description:
BWData.addBoostFromTile (/unique_chucks/22/0x53d34d53a692e6352565909acda5af9145f11bf6.sol#227-243) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _tile.claimer == _attacker
	- _tile.claimer == _defender

BWData.addUser (/unique_chucks/22/0x53d34d53a692e6352565909acda5af9145f11bf6.sol#131-137) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(user.creationTime == 0) (/unique_chucks/22/0x53d34d53a692e6352565909acda5af9145f11bf6.sol#135)

BWData.hasUser (/unique_chucks/22/0x53d34d53a692e6352565909acda5af9145f11bf6.sol#140-142) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- users[_user].creationTime != 0 (/unique_chucks/22/0x53d34d53a692e6352565909acda5af9145f11bf6.sol#142)

BWData.addBoostFromTile (/unique_chucks/22/0x53d34d53a692e6352565909acda5af9145f11bf6.sol#227-243) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _tile.claimer == _defender (/unique_chucks/22/0x53d34d53a692e6352565909acda5af9145f11bf6.sol#234-243)
	- _tile.claimer == _attacker (/unique_chucks/22/0x53d34d53a692e6352565909acda5af9145f11bf6.sol#229-243)
	- require(bool)(_boost.attackBoost + _tile.blockValue >= _tile.blockValue) (/unique_chucks/22/0x53d34d53a692e6352565909acda5af9145f11bf6.sol#230-231)
	- require(bool)(_boost.defendBoost + _tile.blockValue >= _tile.blockValue) (/unique_chucks/22/0x53d34d53a692e6352565909acda5af9145f11bf6.sol#237)
BWData.BASE_TILE_PRICE_WEI should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0x53d34d53a692e6352565909acda5af9145f11bf6.sol#55-57)
BWUtility.ceil (/unique_chucks/22/0x53d34d53a692e6352565909acda5af9145f11bf6.sol#9-13) should be declared external
BWUtility.isAdjacent (/unique_chucks/22/0x53d34d53a692e6352565909acda5af9145f11bf6.sol#19-26) should be declared external
